page.title: 10POLROAD AND TREROOSEL
page.content: POLROAD AND TREROOSEL WERE LISTED IN THE ORIGINAL DOMESDAY SURVEY IN 1086. {POLROAD,}HELD BY THE COUNT OF MORETAIN, HAD LAND FOR 3 PLOUGHS. IT SUPPORTED 4 VILLAGERS, 3 SMALLHOLDERS AND A SLAVE. THERE WERE 3 ACRES OF WOODLAND AND 17 ACRES OF PASTURE. 3 CATTLE, 20 SHEEP AND 4 GOATS WERE LISTED. IN 1985 "POLROAD COTTAGES" IS THE HOME OF THE CLARKSONS. MR CLARKSON IS A PANEL BEATER SPECIALISING IN M.G. CARS AND MRS CLARKSON PROVIDES BED AND BREAKFAST ACCOMODATION IN THE OLD HOUSE. {TREROOSEL,}IN 1086, WAS HELD BY WILHOMARCH. IT HAD LAND FOR 1 PLOUGH. IT SUPPORTED 1 SMALLHOLDER AND 2 SLAVES. THERE WAS 1 ACRE OF MEADOW AND 1 ACRE OF WOODLAND. TODAT IT IS A SMALL FARM WITH A VERY ATTRACTIVE SMALL STONE FARMHOUSE.
